body_html:
Same issue as @NicolaOrritos - I followed all the instructions, with a fresh CUDA and tensorflow-gpu install. I also get the Could not find 'cudart64_90.dll' ... message. Funnily enough, there is a file called cudart64_92.dll in the bin folder that is on my PATH. I just copied that and changed the name, now I get a different message:

... File "...\Anaconda3\lib\importlib\__init__.py", line 126, in import_module return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level) ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

and During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

... File "...\Anaconda3\lib\importlib\__init__.py", line 126, in import_module return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level) ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found. Failed to load the native TensorFlow runtime.

There's a link to an FAQ page, but I couldn't find this issue there.

Funnily enough, there is a file called cudart64_92.dll in the bin folder that is on my PATH. I just copied that and changed the name, now I get a different message:
... File "...\Anaconda3\lib\importlib\__init__.py", line 126, in import_module return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level) ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.
and During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
... File "...\Anaconda3\lib\importlib\__init__.py", line 126, in import_module return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level) ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found. Failed to load the native TensorFlow runtime.
There's a link to an FAQ page, but I couldn't find this issue there.
body:
Same issue as @NicolaOrritos - I followed all the instructions, with a fresh CUDA and tensorflow-gpu install. I also get the `Could not find 'cudart64_90.dll' ...` message. Funnily enough, there is a file called `cudart64_92.dll` in the bin folder that is on my PATH. I just copied that and changed the name, now I get a different message:

`...
File "...\Anaconda3\lib\importlib\__init__.py", line 126, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.`

and `During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:`

`...
File "...\Anaconda3\lib\importlib\__init__.py", line 126, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.
Failed to load the native TensorFlow runtime.`

There's a link to an FAQ page, but I couldn't find this issue there.
